resources.string: Failed to download new version, please try again later.
Update the app with new version.
\nIf you do not update, you cannot use the app.
Please allow to install app from this source.%1$s
Downloading new version of kotlin cheat sheet app.
Fetching new kotlin topics list from github.
Fetching new coroutine topics list from github.
Fetching new points list from github.
There are no kotlin topics available in the database.
Failed to Save points on the database.
You can see the visualization of the topic raised on this page.
Running three tasks in the main thread sequentially.
Running some tasks in another thread.\nTasks in separate threads (task2, task3, task4, and task5) execute concurrently with tasks (task1, task6) in the main thread.
Running some tasks in another coroutine but in the main thread.\nTasks in separate coroutines (task2, task3, task4, and task5) execute concurrently with tasks (task1, task6) in the main thread.

Running some tasks by runBlocking in the main thread.\nWhen it comes to runBlocking, the main thread remains blocked until its children complete execution.\nThe tasks in the runBlocking execute in two separate coroutine concurrently.
Running three tasks by coroutines in the specific scope in the same context.

Running some tasks by coroutineScope function in the main thread.\nThe coroutineScope function is executed in the coroutine created by CoroutineScope(Dispatchers. Main).launch { ... }.\nThe coroutineScope function suspend the coroutine that execute in it until all launched its children complete.
The Gemini model runs directly in the app and generates answers locally.
